name: Precision CNC Machining
description: High-precision CNC machining services for complex parts and prototypes with tolerances up to ±0.0001 inches.
specifications: Tolerances: ±0.0001", Max size: 48" x 24" x 20", Materials: Aluminum, Steel, Titanium, Plastics

name: Custom Assembly Services
description: Complete assembly solutions from sub-assemblies to finished products with comprehensive testing and quality control.
specifications: Assembly volumes: 1-10,000 units, Integration testing, Quality documentation

name: Quality Control & Inspection
description: Comprehensive quality assurance with advanced inspection equipment and certified measurement processes.
specifications: ISO 9001:2015, AS9100D, ITAR registered, Full traceability

name: Prototype Development
description: Rapid prototyping services for product development, testing, and validation with quick turnaround times.
specifications: 1-5 day turnaround, Multiple materials, Design feedback included

name: Production Machining
description: High-volume production machining with consistent quality, automated processes, and lean manufacturing principles.
specifications: Volumes: 100-100,000+ parts, Consistent quality, Competitive pricing

name: Surface Treatment & Finishing
description: Complete finishing services including anodizing, plating, painting, and specialized coatings for enhanced performance.
specifications: Military specs, Commercial standards, Custom colors available

name: Material Procurement
description: Complete material sourcing and procurement services with certified suppliers and full material traceability.
specifications: Certified suppliers, Full traceability, Competitive pricing

name: Engineering Support
description: Design for manufacturability consulting, reverse engineering, and technical support throughout the product lifecycle.
specifications: Experienced engineers, Latest software tools, DFM optimization
